Package org.apache.sis.style

package org.apache.sis.style
Symbology for styling map data independently of their source. This is a placeholder for future evolution. The following works in progress can be sources for the definition of a future style API:
  • ISO 19117:2012 — Portrayal (under review as of June 2023)
  • OGC Styles and Symbology Encoding standard working group
  • OGC 3D Portrayal standard working group
  • OGC Portrayal discussion working group
  • OGC API — Styles standard working group
As of June 2023 we have not yet determined how to consolidate above works in a Java API. The org.apache.sis.style.se1 package, which is derived from SE 1.1 standard, is used an an interim API.
Since:
1.5
